itemDescription: Professional darts player from Northern Ireland

wikipedia_page.main: Geoffrey "Geoff" Wylie (born 23 September 1956 from Ballymena) is a retired Northern Irish professional darts player who currently plays in the Professional Darts Corporation events.

response: * Geoff Wylie (b.1956), from Ballymena, darts player
